text: A Spanish publication, Magazine de Fuera de Serie, released an explosive cover of Michelle Obama's head superimposed on the body of a slave. OK! GALLERY : THE OBAMA WOMEN CIAO DOWN IN ROME Michelle face tops the body of an African Guadeloupean female slave painted by French artist Marie - Guilhelmine Benoist in 1800, which critics say is a racist interpretation of the modern day politico. The first lady is draped in an American flag, wears a headscrarf with her breast out, and is perched beside the the headline â€” ` ` Michelle Granddaughter of a Slave, Lady of America.''
